title: Wildlife tourism may negatively affect African elephants' behavior

title_detail.value: Wildlife tourism may negatively affect African elephants' behavior

summary: Increasing numbers of tourists are interested in observing wildlife such as African elephants, and income generated from tourism potentially aids in the protection of animals and their habitats. However, a new study reveals that wildlife tourism may be a stressor for free-ranging elephants.
